sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: It's become a Chinese custom for many familes to watch the CCTV New Year Gala while having their dinner.
sentences.chinese: 喫年夜飯看春晚已經成爲很多中國家庭的習俗。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve is the time for family reunion.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，遲一頓豐富年夜飯，是家人團聚的時候。

sentences.english: It seemed like a harmless drug.
sentences.chinese: 年夜麻看上往像是一種無害的福壽膏。

sentences.english: But I am afraid that for the vast majority it is not so.
sentences.chinese: 但死怕大年夜大都現象非是如此。

sentences.english: Parents keep busy preparing the New Year's Eve dinner and making jiaozi—dumplings with meat and vegetable fillings.
sentences.chinese: 父母忙着準備年夜飯，包餃子肉和蔬菜做餡的餃子。

sentences.english: We had dumplings made by the whole family for dinner on lunar New Year's Eve ere.
sentences.chinese: 全家人聚在一起喫年夜飯是多麼幸福的事情。

sentences.english: Shenyang is the capital of Liaoning Province. It's the largest city in the Northeast.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽是遼寧省的省會，它是東北最大年夜的皆會。

sentences.english: After dinner, all the family stays up late to welcome the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在新年前夕，大家愛購置年貨，米西年夜飯。

sentences.english: It is really a pain, you know?
sentences.chinese: 做年夜飯是非常費事的，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Visiting relatives is still considered a major event on the first day of the first Lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 延續自大年夜，拜年依然是大年初一的重要活動。

sentences.english: He grew up in an environment of poverty.
sentences.chinese: 他正在貧困的環境中少大年夜。

sentences.english: Ha ha, however I made out the menu of the dinner on new year's eve with my parents yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，昨天還是纏着他們把年夜飯的菜譜搞定了。

sentences.english: On the Eve of Chinese New Year, supper is a feast with families. The family will end the night with firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜，家人會一起喫年夜飯，過年時會放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Southwest Jiaotong University, Emei Campus 36th Party Schools talented students.
sentences.chinese: 西南交大大年夜峨眉校區第三十六期黨校優良學員。

sentences.english: That hotel probably costs no less than 20 dollars a night.
sentences.chinese: 那間旅店的留宿費年夜約要20元一晚呢。

definition: last day of the lunar year/Chinese New Year's Eve
(of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve/family reunion at New Year's
last day of the lunar year/Chinese New Year's Eve
to see in the New Year/to stay up all night on lunar New Year's Eve
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
to pay a New Year call/to wish sb a Happy New Year
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
Lantern Festival/night of the 15th of the first lunar month/see also 元夜[yuan2 ye4]/sticky rice dumplings
